template.name: SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP
template.description: Zabbix template for Siemens Scalance SC646-2C, extended with detailed SNMP items and discovery rules for monitoring various aspects like Ethernet ports, SFP diagnostics, power supply, system faults. Updated for full port monitoring and specific SC646-2C OIDs.

trigger.name: Scalance SC646-2C: Unavailable by ICMP ping
trigger.description: Ostatnie trzy próby zwróciły timeout. Sprawdź łączność urządzenia.

trigger.expression: min(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/icmppingloss,5m)<100
trigger.name: Scalance SC646-2C: High ICMP ping loss

dependency.name: Scalance SC646-2C: Unavailable by ICMP ping

trigger.name: Scalance SC646-2C: High ICMP ping response time

dependency.name: Scalance SC646-2C: High ICMP ping loss
dependency.expression: min(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/icmppingloss,5m)<100

dependency.name: Scalance SC646-2C: Unavailable by ICMP ping

item.name: System Fault State
item.description: Ogólny stan awarii systemu. (1: noFault, 2: fault)

trigger.name: Device {HOST.NAME} is in fault state
trigger.description: Urządzenie znajduje się w stanie awarii.

item.name: SINEMA RC Connection Status
item.description: Status połączenia z serwerem SINEMA RC. (1: established, 2: pending, 3: error, 4: disabled, 5: unknown)

trigger.name: SINEMA RC connection on {HOST.NAME} is not established
trigger.description: Połączenie z SINEMA RC nie jest nawiązane.

trigger.expression: last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/snmp.get[snMspsSystemDeviceType.0])<>last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/snmp.get[snMspsSystemDeviceType.0])
trigger.name: Device Type changed on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Typ urządzenia został zmieniony. Potwierdź, aby ręcznie zamknąć problem.

item.name: SNMP traps (fallback)
item.description: The item is used to collect all SNMP traps unmatched by other snmptrap items

item.name: Scalance SC646-2C: System contact details
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Scalance SC646-2C: System description
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software.

item.name: Scalance SC646-2C: Hardware serial number
item.description: MIB: SN-MSPS-SCX200-MIB Serial number of the switch

trigger.expression: last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/system.hw.serialnumber,#1)<>last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/system.hw.serialnumber,#2) and length(last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/system.hw.serialnumber))>0
trigger.name: Scalance SC646-2C: Device has been replaced
trigger.description: Device serial number has changed. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

item.name: Scalance SC646-2C: Uptime (hardware)
item.description: MIB: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB The amount of time since this host was last initialized. Note that this is different from sysUpTime in the SNMPv2-MIB [RFC1907] because sysUpTime is the uptime of the network management portion of the system.

item.name: Scalance SC646-2C: System location
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The physical location of this node (e.g., `telephone closet, 3rd floor'). If the location is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Scalance SC646-2C: System name
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB An administratively-assigned name for this managed node.By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

trigger.expression: last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/system.name,#1)<>last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/system.name,#2) and length(last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/system.name))>0
trigger.name: Scalance SC646-2C: System name has changed
trigger.description: The name of the system has changed. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

item.name: Scalance SC646-2C: Uptime (network)
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The time (in hundredths of a second) since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

item.name: Scalance SC646-2C: System object ID
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The vendor's authoritative identification of the network management subsystem contained in the entity. This value is allocated within the SMI enterprises subtree (1.3.6.1.4.1) and provides an easy and unambiguous means for determining`what kind of box' is being managed. For example, if vendor`Flintstones, Inc.' was assigned the subtree1.3.6.1.4.1.4242, it could assign the identifier 1.3.6.1.4.1.4242.1.1 to its `Fred Router'.

item.name: Scalance SC646-2C: Operating system
item.description: MIB: SN-MSPS-SCX200-MIB Operating System running on this unit

trigger.expression: last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/system.sw.os[snMspsSystemSwVersion.0],#1)<>last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/system.sw.os[snMspsSystemSwVersion.0],#2) and length(last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/system.sw.os[snMspsSystemSwVersion.0]))>0
trigger.name: Scalance SC646-2C: Operating system has changed
trigger.event_name: Scalance SC646-2C: Operating system has changed (new OS: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Operating system has changed. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

trigger.name: Scalance SC646-2C: No SNMP data collection
trigger.description: SNMP jest niedostępne do odpytywania. Sprawdź łączność urządzenia i ustawienia SNMP.

dependency.name: Scalance SC646-2C: Unavailable by ICMP ping

item.name: System Services
item.description: The integer representing the set of services that this entity primarily offers.

trigger.name: System services changed on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.expression: last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/system.services[sysServices.0]) <> last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/system.services[sysServices.0])
trigger.description: The system services value has changed. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

item_prototype.name: Fan {#SNMPINDEX}: Speed
item_prototype.description: Prędkość wentylatora w obrotach na minutę (RPM).

item_prototype.name: Fan {#SNMPINDEX}: State
item_prototype.description: Stan wentylatora. (1: operational, 2: failed, 3: powering, 4: notpowering, 5: notpresent)

trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#SNMPINDEX} on {HOST.NAME} is in critical state
Nazwa: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Duplex status UNKNOWN
trigger_prototype.description: Gdy tryb duplex jest nieznany, trigger jest uruchamiany.

trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): High inbound discarded packet rate
trigger_prototype.description: Wysoki wskaźnik odrzuconych pakietów wejściowych na interfejsie {#IFNAME} ({#IFALIAS}).

trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): High inbound error rate
trigger_prototype.description: Wysoki wskaźnik błędów wejściowych na interfejsie {#IFNAME} ({#IFALIAS}).

trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): High outbound discarded packet rate
trigger_prototype.description: Wysoki wskaźnik odrzuconych pakietów wyjściowych na interfejsie {#IFNAME} ({#IFALIAS}).

trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): High outbound error rate
trigger_prototype.description: Wysoki wskaźnik błędów wyjściowych na interfejsie {#IFNAME} ({#IFALIAS}).

trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Port is locked
trigger_prototype.description: Port {#IFNAME} ({#IFALIAS}) jest zablokowany (MAC Learning i Forwarding wyłączone).

discovery_rule.name: SFP Diagnostics Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Odkrywanie diagnostyki SFP na podstawie snMspsDiagnosticsTemperatureEntry.

trigger_prototype.name: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Temperature is above critical threshold ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})
trigger_prototype.description: Temperatura modułu SFP jest powyżej krytycznego progu.

trigger_prototype.name: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Temperature is above warning threshold ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})

dependency.name: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Temperature is above critical threshold ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})

trigger_prototype.name: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Voltage is too low ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})
trigger_prototype.description: Napięcie modułu SFP jest zbyt niskie.

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/sfp.current[snMspsSfpCurrent.{#SNMPINDEX}])<{$SFP.CURRENT.MIN} or last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/sfp.current[snMspsSfpCurrent.{#SNMPINDEX}])>{$SFP.CURRENT.MAX}
trigger_prototype.name: SFP {#SFPNAME} ({#SFPSERIAL}): Current out of range
SFP {#SFPNAME} ({#SFPSERIAL}): Module missing or faulty
trigger_prototype.description: Moduł SFP {#SFPNAME} ({#SFPSERIAL}) jest brakujący lub uszkodzony.

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/sfp.voltage[snMspsSfpVoltage.{#SNMPINDEX}])<{$SFP.VOLTAGE.MIN} or last(/SCALANCE SC646-2C by SNMP/sfp.voltage[snMspsSfpVoltage.{#SNMPINDEX}])>{$SFP.VOLTAGE.MAX}
trigger_prototype.name: SFP {#SFPNAME} ({#SFPSERIAL}): Voltage out of range
